source.name: Targeted Minor Home Repair Program
source.description: The Targeted Minor Home Repair Program assists homeowners who live in targeted areas within neighborhood strategy areas identified in the 2012-2016 Consolidated Plan. Applicants must own and reside in the property to be repaired, cannot own more than one residential property, and cannot have received home repair assistance from the City in the last five years. Eligible applications may become ineligible if conditions of the home are determined to be beyond the scope of departmental program guidelines.
